short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Welcome to Coffee Clicker, the ultimate idle game where your coffee empire awaits!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Start your journey by clicking a steaming cup of coffee to earn cash and build your way to coffee supremacy. Invest wisely to buy powerful upgrades that boost your coffee production and grow your business from a humble coffee machine to a sprawling coffee Empire!
